Email.title: Email
Email.description: Email address (optional). If provided, the Flow will try to find an existing Contact with the same email to avoid duplicates. Example: priya@example.com

FirstName.title: FirstName
FirstName.description: Short given name of the contact. Example: “Priya”. Leave blank if unknown.

LastName.title: LastName
LastName.description: The contact’s last (family) name. Required to create a new contact. Example: Gupta.

Phone.title: Phone
Phone.description: Phone number (optional). Prefer E.164 if available. Examples: +14155550101 or 415-555-0101.
